name: Kudos Coral
description: "Simply the best! Amazingly free flowering and easy to grow. Kudos 'Coral' has an impeccable habit and long lasting, glowing color. Warm, coral colored plumes are dense with a sweet honey-mint scent. A real standout in mixed containers, or as a border plant."
comments: "Long days benefit overall plant vigor and flowering. Pinching at transplant is beneficial."
